column1: #Text=Let's get real..... women in America voted for who ever they want to and even with the chance to elect  a first female President they didn't.
#Text=They didn't trust her and Americans voted for change and voted against the elitist politicians and all that goes with it.
#Text=Trump will adjust and the world will go on...... he may do as well as Regan or better.
#Text=Or ...... he'll be gone in Four years and the next great hope will show up.
#Text=The American vote was not about an anti women agenda.........relax and due some deep breathing
